GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
spi: tegra20-slink: fix UAF in tegra_slink_remove()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 415b4ce61308f24583912d887772dfcbf97f1d20, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit 26c863418221344b1cfb8e6c11116b2b81144281. For more details please see the references link.
